metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28736 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in some Intel(R) SSD Tools software before versionmdadm-4.2-rc2 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalationof privilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28736` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mdadm - 4.2+20230508-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mdadm package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2+20230508-6ubuntu1').
